attributes.action: Shut the borders to stop new variants coming into our country
attributes.additional_details: To stop new variants coming into the UK
attributes.background: Shut our borders to foreign travellers to stop new variants coming into the UK, let essentials in but no foreign holidays until the rest of the world has covid under control

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564165
